articles.title: Irish vaccine taskforce recommends limiting AZ jab to over-60s - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Ireland's vaccine taskforce on Monday recommended the AstraZeneca coronavirus jab be limited to those aged over 60, following European reviews of evidence linking the shot to rare blood clotting events.
